select pai.startTime as startTime , m.name as movieName , m.img as movieImg , h.name as hallName , md.language as language ,md.length as length , md.price as moviePrice, mt.startDate as startDate, ml.name as yuyan ,tc.level as jibie, tc.zk as zk FROM t_paiqi pai LEFT JOIN t_movie m on m.id = pai.movieId
LEFT JOIN t_hall h on pai.hallId = h.id LEFT JOIN t_movie_detail md on md.movieId = m.id LEFT JOIN t_movie_time mt on mt.movieId = m.id LEFT JOIN t_movie_language ml on ml.id = md.language LEFT JOIN t_user_info ui on ui.userId = 1 LEFT JOIN t_consumer tc on tc.level = ui.consumerId where pai.id = #{value}
